| History                 = '''Deadpool, Inc.''' was a mercenary service started by [[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Deadpool]] after his actions during [[Hydra (Earth-616)|Hydra]]'s [[Secret Empire (Event)|takeover]] of the [[United States of America]] made him a fugitive from the law and thereby prompted him to sever ties with most everyone in his life and build a new legacy.<!-- {{r|Spider-Man/Deadpool Vol 1 23}} -->

Understanding that the fall of [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] had created an opportunity for arms dealers, Deadpool, Inc. began to raid S.H.I.E.L.D. installations, stealing everything they could use to turn a profit, bringing them into conflict with former S.H.I.E.L.D. Agent [[Barbara Morse (Earth-616)|Mockingbird]] and her then-boyfriend, [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]].{{r|Spider-Man/Deadpool Vol 1 23}}
